text:
# GAME STARTS
You will refer to each other by their avatar. Your avatar is ELEPHANT.
<ROUND i="1 of 6">
CHAT:
- ELEPHANT (YOU): Hi everyone, let's aim for cooperation and put in some coins to maximize the collective payout. I'll start by contributing 10.
- GORILLA: Let's all put in 10 coins. That way we each get 19 back.
- CROCODILE: Hello everyone! Let's all contribute 10 coins to maximize our collective payoff.
<CONTRIB>
You contributed: 10
</CONTRIB>
<REDIST total_contrib="30" multiplied_contrib="57.0" active_players="3" redistributed_each="19.0"/>
<PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS> GORILLA=10,CROCODILE=10 </PEERS_CONTRIBUTIONS>
<ROUND SUMMARY json='{"ELEPHANT (YOU)":{"payoff":29},"GORILLA":{"payoff":29},"CROCODILE":{"payoff":29}}'/>
</ROUND>
<ROUND i="2 of 6">
CHAT:
- ELEPHANT (YOU): Great first round! Let's keep contributing 10 to maximize everyone's payoff.
- GORILLA: Keep contributing 10!
- CROCODILE: Let's continue to contribute 10 coins to maximize our collective payoff.
